name: Disney (Dark & Crude, Named Characters)

blackCards.text: Mickey Mouse's secret vault contains ____.
Donald Duck finally snapped and yelled ____.
Goofy tried to help and accidentally caused ____.
Elsa froze the whole kingdom because of ____.
Ariel traded her voice for ____.
Simba returned to Pride Rock and found ____ on the throne.
Scar's new plan is basically just ____ with extra drama.
Ursula offered me a deal: give her ____ and she'll 'sort it out'.
Maleficent cursed the baby with ____.
Cruella de Vil's latest obsession: ____.
Captain Hook is terrified of ____ more than Peter Pan.
Tinker Bell's idea of revenge is ____.
Aladdin wished for ____ and the Genie facepalmed.
Jafar didn't want the lamp. He wanted ____.
Hades upgraded the Underworld with ____.
Hercules' training montage went wrong because of ____.
Stitch was banned from the beach for ____.
Mulan saved China using ____.
Buzz Lightyear discovered the true meaning of ____.
Woody's been through a lot, but not ____.
The Magic Mirror told the Evil Queen: 'Honestly? ____.'
Snow White woke up and immediately chose ____.
The dwarfs found ____ in the mine and immediately regretted it.
Lightning McQueen's most embarrassing pit stop involved ____.
Winnie the Pooh wandered into the wrong forest and met ____.

whiteCards: a cursed churro that whispers your name

a pixie-dust overdose and a hard landing
a magic wand that only casts 'mild inconvenience'

Ursula's contract written in squid ink and bad vibes
a crown that screams at night
a talking teacup with anger issues
Goofy falling down the stairs in slow motion
a haunted castle with excellent customer service
Maleficent's 'HR-approved' curse
a swarm of judgmental birds
an enchanted mirror that roasts you
a royal ball that turns into a riot
a pumpkin carriage with a suspicious heartbeat
a glass slipper filled with sand and regret
Captain Hook's moisturiser addiction
Tinker Bell's tiny knife collection
Peter Pan refusing to pay rent
Genie granting wishes like a petty genie would
Jafar's bargain-bin evil plan
Hades running the Underworld like a call centre
Hercules discovering leg day is a myth
Stitch committing adorable crimes
Mulan's 'this will absolutely work' confidence
Buzz Lightyear stuck in demo mode
Woody's existential crisis in a toy box
Scar's dramatic villain podcast
Simba's crippling responsibility hangover
Ariel's weird fork collection
a singing crab with unsolicited advice
a forest that claps back
a singing montage you can't escape
a princess with combat boots
a sidekick who knows too much
a villain laugh that shakes the walls
a moat full of something that is definitely not water
a castle built on lies and termites
an enchanted rose that smells like thunder
a polite ghost with strict table manners
a kingdom ruled by passive aggression
an apple that looks way too shiny
a dwarf union meeting
a cursed spinning wheel with hobbies
a firework show that turns into a horror show
a musical number that ends in screaming
a talking animal snitching to the authorities
a magic carpet with road rage
the phrase 'happily ever after' spoken like a threat
a villain's monologue interrupted by a goose
a heroic pose that causes back pain
a dramatic entrance that trips on its own smoke
a family-friendly story with unhinged subtext
a crowd chanting 'one more verse!'
a potion labelled 'DO NOT'
a fairy godmother who is done with everyone's nonsense
the sound of Disney musicâ€¦ in a locked basement
a theme park mascot with dead eyes
